titleStmt.title: announcement concerning practise of a trade
titleStmt.author: Dioskoros, freedman of Sarapion

revisionDesc.change: Pull translation out of APIS record.

div.ab: To Diogenes, alias Hermaios, ex-exegetes, scribe of the city, from Dioskoros, freedman of Sarapion, son of Sarapion, grandson of Dio..., inhabitant of Oxyrhynchos in the quarter of Hermaios. I wish to begin from the present thirteenth year of Hadrianus Caesar the lord to practise the trade of a river-worker; accordingly I present this application as above. Year thirteenth [

listBibl.bibl: Hengstl, Griechische Papyri, 1978, no 9, pp. 48-50 Grenfell BP - Hunt AS, POxy X, 1263, 1914 -- BL XI, 148 (resolution of "exeget( )" in l. 2) Hunt AS - Edgar CC, Select Papyri II, 317, 1934
